name: Makeout Mountain
description: Couples climb it to smooch against the cliff face and forget what embarrassment is.

name: Sardine Pier
description: Where the sea splashes, the fish slap, and arguments over ‘who caught what’ echo forever.

name: Thinky Bay
description: Ideal for deep thoughts like ‘Do marshmallows dream?’ while gulls offer unsolicited opinions.

name: The Sunny Shimmy Shore
description: Locals sunbathe until their eyebrows melt and break into spontaneous sand dancing.

name: Skitter Pebble Beach
description: A chaotic splash zone where skipping stones leads to personal growth and wet socks.

name: Chatter Valley
description: Non-stop conversation since 1832. No one remembers the first sentence—or the last.

name: Rattle Hill
description: Steep slope used for sledding and scream therapy. Helmets optional. Regrets guaranteed.

name: Splashypaint Falls
description: Tiny waterfall, big splash fights. Most visitors leave wetter than intended—and slightly tie-dyed.

name: Confuzzle Crossroads
description: No one goes the right way. Not even the signs. Excellent for unplanned adventures.

name: Ruckus Ridge
description: Perfect hilltop for chaotic picnics, ice cream rocket launches, and interpretive yelling.

name: Giggle Hillock
description: Come for the view, stay for the mysterious giggling moss. And the tingly ankles.

name: Tumble Bluff
description: A scenic cliff ideal for mattress parachuting and questionable decisions. Bring snacks.

name: Boingy Beach
description: Surf’s never up, but inflatable boat ballet is always in session.

name: Creaky Corner
description: The oldest gate in town, creaks so much it counts as a horror podcast.

name: Snickerwood
description: A tiny forest filled with laughter pollen and absurdly unhelpful owls.

name: Paddle Lagoon
description: Rent a pedal boat and chat your way in a lazy circle. Purpose discouraged.

name: Debate Dunes
description: The eternal question: Does pizza need sausage? The shouting never ends.

name: Tanglebrush Shortcut
description: Spoiler: it’s never actually a shortcut. But you might find someone’s lost uncle.

name: Jiggle Dock
description: Wooden pier for synchronized bellyflops and dramatic splash-offs.

name: Whisper Swamp
description: Where ants ignore you but whisper rumors to your shoes. No one knows why.

name: Bumpity Pass
description: Narrow path where everyone’s legally required to nudge each other gently.

name: Spinnyfield
description: Open meadow for free-range dancing and standing on one leg until accepted.

name: Babblespray Falls
description: A waterfall that sounds like it's trying to tell you something. Possibly gossip.

name: Sparkle Knoll
description: Best sunset point in town. Also prime location for dramatic monologues and nose whistles.

name: Sillyman’s Corner
description: Legend says the best lie wins a cake. No one’s ever seen the cake.
